A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This really is The Last Jedi\, (movie) at least for me. Plot holes\, weak characters\, unnecessary and boring side quests (added to pad the film?). And why would they give Luke such a terrible character arc? He was never a coward in the original saga. Lea is a super-hero? (turns into Superman?) Snoke is a throw-away villain? Why even have him to begin with? Rey was\, and is a Mary-Sue. It's not just nostalgia\, I have always loved Star Wars. Not anymore. And it makes me very sad. Bad showing Disney.
